Package net.floodlightcontroller.core.module

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IApplicationService  
    IFloodlightModule
    Defines an interface for loadable Floodlight modules.
    IFloodlightModuleContext  
    IFloodlightService
    This is the base interface for any IFloodlightModule package that provides a service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FloodlightModuleContext
    The service registry for an IFloodlightProvider.
    FloodlightModuleLoader
    Finds all Floodlight modules in the class path and loads/starts them.
    ModuleLoaderResource
    Returns list of modules loaded by Floodlight.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FloodlightModulePriority.Priority  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FloodlightModuleConfigFileNotFoundException  
    FloodlightModuleException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    FloodlightModulePriority
    Set a module priority value so if there are multiple modules that provide a given service, and there is a unique module with maximum priority, we will use that module in preference to lower-priority modules rather than requiring users to manually specify a module to load.
    FloodlightServices  
    Run
    Indicate the run() method of a floodlight module
